articles.author: Arjun Kharpal
articles.title: Apple loses EU court battle over 13 billion euro tax bill in Ireland - CNBC
articles.description: Europe's top court on Tuesday ruled against Apple in the tech giant's 10-year court battle over its tax affairs in Ireland.
articles.content:
Europe's top court on Tuesday ruled against Apple in the tech giant's 10-year court battle over its tax affairs in Ireland.
The pronouncement from the European Court of Justice comes hours after App… [+1933 chars]
